mplstyle.matplotlibPath.description: The installation directory of matplotlib used to generate the documentation, e.g. /home/foo/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/matplotlib. If it is an empty string, the data shipped with the extension will be used.

mplstyle.showComparisonImage.description: Controls whether to show comparison images in the hover

mplstyle.pythonPath.description: Path to the Python executable to display previews, e.g. /usr/bin/python3, defaults to the output of `which python3 || which py || which python`

mplstyle.previewOnSave.description: Controls whether to show a preview on save

mplstyle.showPreviewButton.description: Controls whether to show a button to show previewer on the editor

scripts.prepare: python3 scripts/generate_documentation_images.py && npm i @vscode/webview-ui-toolkit@0.8.2 --prefix webview-ui-toolkit && cp webview-ui-toolkit/node_modules/@vscode/webview-ui-toolkit/dist/toolkit.min.js src/preview/webview-ui-toolkit.min.js && rimraf webview-ui-toolkit
